description: Configuration for time-series basis selection (generate per-date basis lists).

prices_path.description: CSV of monthly prices (index=dates, cols=tickers) used to compute rolling distances

marketcap_path.description: Optional CSV of market cap values (index=dates) used as weights when selecting basis

output_path.description: Where to write the resulting per-date basis CSV (columns: date,basis)

k.description: Number of basis tickers to select per date

method_kwargs.description: Optional method-specific keyword arguments passed to the selector

min_periods.description: Minimum overlapping observations when computing correlations

corr_method.description: Correlation method used for distance computation ('pearson' or 'spearman')

shrink_method.description: Optional covariance shrinkage/denoising method ('lw' or 'pca'). If null, no shrinkage applied.

pca_n_components.description: When using PCA denoising, number of components to keep

pca_explained_variance.description: When using PCA denoising, fraction of explained variance to retain
